creator: StudyPad, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
If your kids love games, they’ll love SplashLearn! It’s the perfect balance of fun and learning packed into an immersive K-5 learning experience, which is loved by over 33 million children.

SplashLearn - Math for kids is curriculum-aligned and covers 400+ skills through fun games like counting, addition and subtraction, multiplication games, fractions, math facts etc. It’s the world's first scientifically-designed, game-based math curriculum, which adapts to your child’s pace and creates a personalized learning path for them in kindergarten, 1st, 2nd, 3rd, 4th, and 5th grade.

Grade-Wise Overview
• Kindergarten learning games: Kindergarten math have your kids play through the educational app in a unique way to master basic math skills! Practice 123 numbers with cute animal friends. Your child learns with identifying shapes games, counting games and addition & subtraction for kids
• Math Games for 1st Grade: 1st grade learning games have so much new to learn – addition & subtraction for kids, counting games for kids, telling time, etc. From flipping coins and counting money and learning via math facts, your child can make use of a variety of virtual manipulatives to aid their learning.
• Math Games for 2nd Grade: 2nd grade learning games is all about addition & subtraction for kids, math facts games, money games for kids, learning numbers for kids, telling time for kids etc.
• Math Games for 3rd Grade: 3rd grade learning games is when things start to heat up a little. With new math facts and concepts such as multiplication games for kids, division games, fraction games, and learning times tables, SplashLearn ensures your child grasps the fundamentals well.
• Math Games for 4th Grade: 4th grade learning games take basics like addition and subtraction games, multiplication games and fraction games to the next level with times tables for kids, decimal to fraction etc.
• Math Games for 5th Grade: 5th grade learning games consolidate on the basics with advanced math practice games for multiplication games, division games, fraction games, and decimal games.

Awards and Mentions
• Parent Choice Award
• Editor's Choice Award - Children's Technology Review
• Featured on Fox News
• Winner of “Gold Stevie Award” (2013) in “Education and Reference” category
• Winner of “Tabby Awards” (2012) in “Best Education and Training App” category
• Winner of “Best Elementary Student App” (2011) by BestAppEver.com
• Featured in Apple lists - “Staff Favorite”, “New and Newsworthy”

Why SplashLearn?
• A vast library of content to practice, master and explore
• Personalized daily learning plans to keep your child ahead of the class
• Kid-friendly and safe interface, designed for independent use
• Exciting rewards and rich, narrative-driven app to keep learning fun, always
• Anytime, anywhere access: Play on the go

Subscription
To give you a good look at our learning experience, we offer a free 7-day trial when you sign up. After the trial, you can choose to subscribe on a monthly, quarterly or annual basis. Just in case you change your mind, you can cancel your subscription easily through your Play Store settings.
• Payment will be charged to your Play Store account at the end of the 7-day free trial unless canceled.
• Don't want to auto-renew? Just turn off auto-renew in your user account settings. Your account will be automatically canceled at the end of the subscription period.

Privacy Policy
https://www.splashlearn.com/privacy

Terms of Use
https://www.splashlearn.com/terms-of-use

Support
We would love to hear your feedback. In case you have any questions, please write to us at help@splashlearn.com.

Let's connect
Hit us up at SplashLearnOfficial on Facebook, @splashlearn on Instagram.

title: SplashLearn: Grades K-5 | Kids Learning Math Games

creator: StudyPad, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
If your kids love games, they’ll love SplashLearn! An immersive math learning experience for PreK to Grade 5 (3-11 years), SplashLearn is the perfect balance of fun & learning. It is loved by over 33 million families worldwide.

SplashLearn covers Preschool & Kindergarten to Grade 5 math skills like counting (123), number sense, addition, subtraction & multiplication through cool games. It’s the world's 1st scientifically-designed, game-based math curriculum that adapts to your kid’s pace and creates a personalized learning path for them.

Why choose SplashLearn for your kid?
• Vast library of game-based math content for kids to study, practice and master
• Personalized learning path to build a routine for boys and girls
• Kid-friendly and safe
• Cool, narrative-driven math learning games keep kids engaged
• Boys and girls can play on the go (works offline and across devices)

Grade-Wise Overview
•Preschool and Kindergarten: From learning to count to identifying shapes, these cool educational games make math fun for toddlers and older kids alike. Counting or 123 games form the basis of both Preschool and Kindergarten Common Core math.
•1st Grade Math: Young boys and girls are introduced to numbers, addition, subtraction, facts, telling time, etc. with fun, kid-friendly learning games.
•2nd Grade Math: It’s all about counting in groups, comparing numbers, and addition & subtraction in Grade 2. Kids also pick up the basics of multiplication in this grade.
•3rd Grade Math: With new concepts like multiplication, division, times tables & fractions, SplashLearn's skill progression ensures your kid is learning fundamentals well.
•4th and 5th Grade Math: Takes basics like addition, subtraction, multiplication & division to the next level with advanced learning games so that 4th-grade & 5th-grade boys and girls can solve multiple-step math problems.

Awards and Mentions
• Parent Choice Award
• Editor's Choice Award - Children's Technology Review
• Featured on Fox News
• Winner of “Gold Stevie Award” (2013) in “Education and Reference” category
• Winner of “Tabby Awards” (2012) in “Best Education and Training App” category
• Winner of “Best Elementary Student App” (2011) by BestAppEver.com

Reviews
“SplashLearn is a very visual app that makes it a wonderful app for visual learners. The interface is simple but has a lot of pictures to help with problem solving and make solving problems fun.” – BridgingApps
“The design is friendlier and more thought out than other virtual workbooks you can download to the iPad. There are enough challenges to keep your kid engaged for long periods of time.” – appoLearning
SplashLearn offers cool free games for boys and girls of ages 3-11. For toddlers, it offers fun practice games that teach shapes, coins, counting (123), numbers, facts, etc. with flashcards or playsheets.

Subscription
To give you a good look at our game-based learning experience apt for both boys and girls, we offer a free 7-day trial. Post trial, you can subscribe on a monthly, quarterly or annual basis. If you change your mind, you can cancel your subscription in Play Store settings.
• Payment will be charged to your Play Store account at the end of the 7-day free trial unless canceled.
• Don't want to auto-renew? Just turn off auto-renew in account settings. Your account will be automatically canceled at the end of the subscription.

Privacy Policy
Your privacy is paramount to us. Do read our privacy policy here (https://www.splashlearn.com/privacy).

Terms of Use
You can read our terms of use here (https://www.splashlearn.com/terms-of-use)

Support
We’d love to hear your feedback. Please write to us at support@splashlearn.com.

Let's connect
Hit us up at SplashLearnOfficial on Facebook & @splashlearn on Instagram.

“The design is friendlier and more thought out than other virtual workbooks you can download to the iPad. There are enough challenges to keep your kid engaged for long periods of time.” – appoLearning
SplashLearn offers cool free games for boys and girls of ages 3-11. For toddlers, it offers fun practice games that teach shapes, coins, counting (123), numbers, facts, etc. with flashcards or playsheets.

Subscription
To give you a good look at our game-based learning experience apt for both boys and girls, we offer a free 7-day trial. Post trial, you can subscribe on a monthly, quarterly or annual basis. If you change your mind, you can cancel your subscription in Play Store settings.
• Payment will be charged to your Play Store account at the end of the 7-day free trial unless canceled.
• Don't want to auto-renew? Just turn off auto-renew in account settings. Your account will be automatically canceled at the end of the subscription.

Privacy Policy
Your privacy is paramount to us. Do read our privacy policy here (https://www.splashlearn.com/privacy).

Terms of Use
You can read our terms of use here (https://www.splashlearn.com/terms-of-use)

Support
We’d love to hear your feedback. Please write to us at support@splashlearn.com.

Let's connect
Hit us up at SplashLearnOfficial on Facebook & @splashlearn on Instagram.

title: SplashLearn - Fun Math Learning Games for Kids

creator: StudyPad, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Discover fun and learning in equal measure with SplashLearn - an immersive PreK to Grade 5 math and reading app loved by over 33 million children.

Spanning Preschool to Grade 5, the SplashLearn app covers over 2000 curriculum-aligned math games set in engaging games. SplashLearn also offers a personalized reading experience for ages 3-8 (PreK to Grade 2). With letters, tracing, phonics and sight words to reading comprehension and bedtime stories, SplashLearn can help your child read their first book within weeks.

SplashLearn is the world's first scientifically-designed, game-based math and reading learning program packaged in a child-friendly and safe app. Maintaining a delicate balance between learning and game-play, SplashLearn ensures your child is actively engaged in learning all the way.

Why SplashLearn?
• 4000+ math and reading games, books and stories
• Personalized learning to keep your child ahead of the class
• Child-friendly and safe, designed for independent use
• Exciting rewards and fun math and reading games to keep learning engaging for your child
• Fun new lessons, books, and stories added regularly
• Anytime, anywhere access: Play on the go

Grade-Wise Overview for SplashLearn Math
• Preschool & Kindergarten: From counting to identifying shapes, these math games are fun and exciting for your child.
• 1st Grade: There is so much new to learn in first grade – addition and subtraction problems, number sense, place value, learning to tell time, etc.
• 2nd Grade: Second-grade math is all about counting in groups, comparing numbers and learning place value. Your child begins to learn these basic math skills in fun educational games that ensure they get a comprehensive learning experience.
• 3rd Grade: Children in third grade learn new skills like multiplication and fractions. SplashLearn's gradual skill progression ensures your child grasps the facts well.
• 4th and 5th Grade: These advanced learning games cover addition and subtraction word problems, multiplication, division, fractions, shapes and time.

Children also can play the fun Math Facts games to boost fluency and gain confidence. Just select a number and an operator to start mastering your facts!

Overview of the SplashLearn Reading Games
• Preschool and Kindergarten: Children begin with learning letter sounds (ABC) and tracing set in fun reading games. They then move on to blending letter sounds to learn their first words (including sight words) and spellings.
• Grade 1 and Grade 2: First and second graders begin learning to read their first decodable and leveled books. Besides fun games, the Reading program also offers a variety of bedtime stories & books to instill good reading habits in young children.

Awards and Mentions
• Parent Choice Award
• Editor's Choice Award - Children's Technology Review
• Winner of “Gold Stevie Award” (2013) in “Education and Reference” category
• Winner of “Tabby Awards” (2012) in “Best Education and Training App” category
• Winner of “Best Elementary Student App” (2011) by [BestAppEver.com]

Subscription
To give you a good look at our learning app, we offer a free 7-day trial when you sign up. After the trial, you can subscribe on a monthly or an annual basis.
• Monthly Plans - Math: $8 | Reading: $8 | Math and Reading: $12
• Yearly Plans - Math: $60 | Reading: $60 | Math and Reading: $90
Just in case you change your mind, you can cancel your subscription easily through the Play Store.
• Payment will be charged to your Play Store account at the end of the 7-day free trial unless canceled.
• Each plan auto-renews until canceled 24 hours prior to the end of the current period.
• Don't want to auto-renew? Just turn off auto-renew in your account settings. Your subscription will be automatically canceled at the end of the current subscription period.

Privacy Policy
https://www.splashlearn.com/privacy

Terms of Use
https://www.splashlearn.com/terms-of-use

title: SplashLearn: Math & Reading - Kids Learning Games

creator: StudyPad, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Learn math and reading through fun games! Inspire lifelong learning with this Preschool, Kindergarten & Grade 1-5 fun learning experience loved by over 40 million kids. SplashLearn is the perfect balance of learning and games that your kids need to build math and reading skills.

READY, SET, PLAY (AND LEARN!)


• Library of 4000+ reading and math games, educational activities, and books
• Personalized daily growth plans to make learning effortless
• Makes learning fun: Motivating rewards & narrative-driven reading and math games & books
• Kid-friendly & safe
• New educational activities, books, and stories added regularly

Math Games for Kids


• Preschool & Kindergarten: From learning to count to identifying shapes & patterns, make it fun for kids.
• 1st Grade: There is so much to learn in first grade – addition and subtraction strategies, place value, telling time, flipping coins, rotating the clock hands & setting time.
• 2nd Grade: Second-grade math games are all about addition, subtraction, counting in groups, comparing numbers, understanding place value & mastering math facts.
• 3rd Grade: This is when things start to get cool. Kids learn new concepts such as multiplication, division & fractions. They master multiplication facts through fun games that are even more effective than flash cards!
• 4th Grade: Advanced learning games & word problems that cover everything - addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, fractions.
• 5th Grade: Kids master multiplication, division, fractions & geometry. Including multiplication word problems.

Reading Games for Kids


A personalized experience for 3-8 year-olds (PreK - Kindergarten to Grade 2). Covering everything from phonics to sight words, books to stories, and reading comprehension, it enables kids to read their first book within weeks.
Through educational & learning games, kids learn essential skills like:
• Letter sounds, ABC & tracing
• Learning their first words & spellings
• Sight words through fun games
• Learning to read their first decodable books
• Reading a variety of bedtime stories & books, so it becomes a daily habit for your kids.
• Sight words for Kindergarten & Preschool
*Subscription*

creator: StudyPad, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
SplashLearn is an award-winning educational app trusted by millions of families and educators worldwide. SplashLearn makes learning fun and engaging for kids ages 2-11 with interactive games, captivating stories, and personalized learning paths that cover early learning for toddlers and preschoolers and Kindergarten to 5th Grade Math and Reading.

Math:
- Cool Math Games: Dive into a world of math games that make learning addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division a thrilling adventure.
- Master Math: Explore engaging activities on times tables multiplication, multiplication table, and multiplication facts.
- Math Play: Solve math problems with ease through interactive exercises and math games designed for every skill level.
- Math Help: Get instant feedback and personalized guidance to overcome any math challenges.
- Build Confidence: From basic number games to complex geometry concepts, SplashLearn helps your child build a strong foundation in math.

Reading:
- Reading Adventures: Embark on exciting reading journeys with interactive stories, engaging narration, and reading practice activities.
- Phonics Fun: Master phonics with engaging games that teach letter sounds, blending, and reading.
- Sight Words Mastery: Learn to recognize and read sight words with ease through interactive games and activities.
- Alphabet Adventures: Explore the abc alphabet with colorful animations, letter tracing exercises, and fun games that make learning the phonetic alphabet a joyful experience.

Early Learning for Toddlers:
- Toddler Games: Engage your little ones with a wide range of toddler games designed for 2 year olds, 3 year olds, and 4 year olds.
- Preschool Learning: Introduce essential preschool concepts like shapes, colors, and numbers through fun and interactive activities.
- Kindergarten Readiness: Prepare your child for kindergarten with engaging activities that focus on early math, reading, and letter recognition.

Key Features:
- Personalized Learning: Adaptive learning paths tailor to each child's unique pace and learning style.
- Engaging Games: Interactive games, puzzles, and activities make learning fun and motivating.
- Skill Reports & Progress Tracking: Monitor your child's progress with detailed reports and celebrate their achievements.
- Common Core Aligned: Our curriculum aligns with Common Core standards, ensuring your child is learning the essential skills.
- Safe & Ad-Free: A 100% kid-friendly environment for worry-free learning.

Get Started Today!
- Free Trial: Experience SplashLearn with a 7-day free trial.
- Flexible Subscriptions: Choose a plan that fits your needs and budget.

Support
Visit support.splashlearn.com for any questions or concerns.

Download SplashLearn now and watch your child become a fearless learner!

Early Learning for Toddlers:
- Toddler Games: Engage your little ones with a wide range of toddler games designed for 2 year olds, 3 year olds, and 4 year olds.
- Preschool Learning: Introduce essential preschool concepts like shapes, colors, and numbers through fun and interactive activities.
- Kindergarten Readiness: Prepare your child for kindergarten with engaging activities that focus on early math, reading, and letter recognition.

Key Features:
- Personalized Learning: Adaptive learning paths tailor to each child's unique pace and learning style.
- Engaging Games: Interactive games, puzzles, and activities make learning fun and motivating.
- Skill Reports & Progress Tracking: Monitor your child's progress with detailed reports and celebrate their achievements.
- Common Core Aligned: Our curriculum aligns with Common Core standards, ensuring your child is learning the essential skills.
